# UIApplication.Category

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe the types of apps in the system.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Category
```

## Overview

Use the values in this enumeration with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/isDefault(_:)] (or, in Objective-C, [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/defaultStatusForCategory:error:]) to find if your app is the person’s default for a category.

## Application categories

- **UIApplication.Category.webBrowser**: The app is a web browser.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Discovering if your app is the default app in a category

- **isDefault(_:)**: Reports whether this app is the person’s default app in the given category.
- **UIApplication.CategoryDefaultError**: Errors that can happen when the system checks if your app is the default app in a category.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
